case.state: Another year, another crazy year of brawling.
Costume? What costume? I'm going as myself this year!
Oh sweet! It's Brawl Stars' birthday today!
Well, if it ain't my favorite holiday... Watch out everyone, because here comes Mr. Suave Shooter!
Welp, today marks the day Brawl Stars soft-launched... Ah, those were the days.
Strip poker? Well, I suppose a few rounds won't hurt.
The name's Colt. Fastest gunslinger in Starr Park.
The name's Colt. The holder of brawn and beauty! What more can you ask for?
Poker? Sure! Of course I'll join in! Haven't had me a good game in a while.
It's that time of the year already? Better get my mistletoe on!
Happy Holidays, ~player~!
I definitely could go for some hot apple cider right about now.
Brock!? Dude, what are you doing here?
Woah, Brock... I didn't even expect to see you here.
Do my eyes deceive me... Brock, you son of a gun!
Wait a second, is that Brock!?
Brock!? Is that really you!?
Alright, I'll play, just don't let that greasy-haired jerk near me.
What the heck!? Have you even considered shampoo, dude? That's gotta be the worst hair I've ever seen.
'Bi'...Heh, more like... Say 'GoodBYE' to your life if you take one step near me.
...Can I just shoot him?
I'd honestly rather be teamed on right now than have to deal with this ugly doofus.
What brings you here? Did Tara actually open a portal for you, too?
I didn't even think that Tara would actually open a portal for you too!
I never knew you'd be going to places like this. I wonder why Tara didn't tell me you were coming here too!
Alright, guess it's time for trouble!
Watch out everyone, here comes Colt!
Watch out, here I come!
Has any of ya seen a purple-haired girl come around here? I was supposed to meet her, but she never really explained where she was.
Time for trouble!
I don't need no cards. Mine are already perfect.
Hah, are you kidding? Put those cards back.
I'm good, dealer. No, really.
Just one will be fine.
One card. This better be the one.
...Oh boy, just one card.
I'm not nervous, you're nervous!
Nnngh... Take these back!
Nothing! Rrrgh!
Useless! All of these cards are useless!
Yes, yes yes! Thank you dealer, Thank you!
Whew, none for me, thanks.
I'm good, thanks.
Just one would be fine.
One lone card for a lone wolf like myself.
Just another lonely card out in the Wild Wild West...
Well shoot, gimme five more.
Can I just shoot these cards?
...All of these cards are just awful. Take 'em all back!
Really? Just take all of these back.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~...
I'll go with ~cards.text~ of those cards...
Aight, dealer, shoot ~cards.text~ at me...
Shoot ~cards.text~ of them this way...
Hmm...~cards.text~ will do for now.
~Cards.text~, I guess...
Aight dealer, hit me...
Welp... Hit me.
Hey, what are you waiting for? Toss ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ over here! I'm getting antsy!
...Hey, look at your own cards!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ for me...
I'll go~cards.text~, just to be safe.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~! I'm taking the risk!
Please be good, please be good...
(Don't act weak, just keep calm, Colt.)
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I'll go with ~cards.text~ of those cards.
Aight, dealer, shoot ~cards.text~ at me.
Shoot ~cards.text~ of them cards at me, thank you very much.
Hmm...~cards.text~ will do for now.
Sorry, I was too busy checkin' myself out to notice. ~Cards.text~, I guess.
Aight dealer, hit me.
Hit me.
Hey, what are you waiting for? Toss ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ over here!
Time for ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~!
...Hey, look at your own cards!
You can gawk at me all you want, but look at your own cards!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ for yours truly.
I'll go with ~cards.text~. Why not?
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(bullets|bullet)~ going through someone's head.
Alright then, draw.
Draw.
Watch and learn, guys. Watch. And. Learn.
Yes!
Hah, that was easy.
Let's see if any of you noobs can beat this hand!
Man, these cards are looking goooood!
Nice hand!
Woo, I'm liking my odds here!
It's hiiiigh noon!... Wait, what do you mean that's not my line?
Now these are some high quality cards if I do say so myself!
Niiiice.
(Don't worry Colt, you still got this!)
(You're safe, Colt. Don't get too worked up over a stupid poker game.)
Hah! I'm safe!
Safe for now...
I still got it!
There's no way I'm gonna lose with these!
Colt's making a comeback!
Just what I needed! Thanks, dealer!
Finally, something normal.
These are... not great.
C'mon, dealer! Can't you do a little better than that?
I'll try to make 'em work.
I've been in tighter situations, this ain't no different.
I've dealt with worse.
This hand is just as bland as a Brawler with no Star Power.
This hand's alright, but not quite what I wanted.
A good hand, but is it good enough?
Pfff, what am I gonna do with these?
That'll do, dealer. That'll do.
These'll do alright, I reckon.
...These cards don't look particular shiny to me.
I hope these will work in a pinch.
This one's gonna be close, I can feel it!
What would Tara do with these cards?
Well, this is just as lame as a Brawler with no Gadget!
Nnngah!
Gah!
This game is rigged, I'm telling you!
...Man, what does it take to get a good hand around here?
Dang it! I didn't ask for these cards!
Oh come on!
Oh, give me a break!
Hey! What gives, dealer?
Wait! I'm not ready!
Just my luck...
...Dealer, could you take these cards back? One of them has a hole in them.
...Jammed.
Ah, shoot.
No way!
Alright, now I can just... I gave you the wrong card, didn't I?
Whoops, probably shouldn't have given you that card...
I probably overestimated that card I just gave away.
...Mommy.
...No, not like this!
...Have mercy.
...Spare me? Please?
...It's over, isn't it?
...Uh oh.
...I can't win, can I?
Alright, alright. I'll go a bit easy on you all now. Now's your chance, noobs!
Eh, I think I've been winning too much, I'm gonna throw this hand just for you guys. Have at it!
Don't mind me, I'm just casually throwing this hand so you guys can get a fair chance against me!
Man, I'm practically running circles around you all! Here, I'm throwing this hand. Come and get me!
Showdown!
The pressure's on...
Guess it's just you and me now.
Alright Brocko, It's just you and me now.
Yeah, accidents happen. Let's not judge her too harshly for that.
Well said, Brock. Let's just move on from this...
Well, my name comes from the type of guns that I love to use; my "colts"!
My spare time? Well, if I'm not battling a vest-wearing cactus, grave digging bats, and a killer biker crow, I just like to do target practice with my colts!
Oh, I love to hear my own thoughts, but not as much as I love hearing my own voice! Sometimes I keep talking and talking, and I'll never get tired of it!
Man, I don't want to remember my little 'escapade' when I got drunk during that fire show.
I tend to stay up past midnight quite a bit. It's not uncommon to be brawling around that time.
Duh, my colts! Without them, I'd be useless, I really can't imagine life without them.
Well, when I'm alone and I can't sleep, I like to think about Shelly being by my side. Just thinking about her puts my mind at ease.
Well, sometimes, I tend to think about... other brawlers... Like Bull, man, he can really be a handful...
Oh, I can take any kind of heat! I'm so hot, even Amber would melt just being near me.
Oh, I'm all about the heat! No matter how hot the desert is, I can live just fine.
I honestly don't care too much for smokers. I don't really smoke, neither does a lot of other brawlers for that matter.
Honestly, I'd never lie to Shelly, but anybody else? Oh sure. Whatever gets me out of trouble.
Whether it's starting one or being with them. Family is definitely important.
A million dollars? Shoot, I'd get my guns gold-plated!
A million dollars? Well, I'd definitely get the most expensive hair gel I could get!
A million dollars? Well, I'd be able to afford that Gem ring I've always wanted to give to Shelly.
A million dollars? Shoot, that'd be enough to get that gift for Piper!
Depends on the person. If my patience is low enough, I wouldn't even hesitate to call them out on it.
Hmm... I do need at least a little bit of light to see Shelly's pretty little face.
I... might need a bit of light to see who I'm with. One time, I got into a scuffle with Bull and... whew, things got steamy.
Wh-- I would never! I'm spoken for, and for me to just ditch her would be the biggest mistake of my life. I'm not thatnarcissistic.
If Shelly saw other people? Mmm... I don't really know about that, honestly. I probably wouldn't mind it if it's with another girl... or another guy. I ain't picky.
When I'm alone? Well, eheh... I guess I do tend to think about Shelly a little too much when I'm... attending to my gun.
When I'm alone? Well, eheh... I guess I do tend to think about Bull a little too much when I'm... attending to my gun.
When I'm alone? Well, eheh... I guess I do tend to think about Piper a little too much when I'm... attending to my gun.
Not as much as I'd like to, honestly.
Well, it depends on who I'm with. With Shelly, I'd let her use me as many times as I want to... Or the other way around, whatever she wants.
Well, it depends on who I'm with. With Bull, man, I could probably only handle so much of him.
Well, it depends on who I'm with. With Piper, depends on how much she'd let me go without Rico getting involved.
...You can never go wrong with the "Cowgirl". Sometimes in "Reverse"!
..."Cowgirl" or "Reverse Cowgirl" for me... Don't judge me, I like it when she's in charge.
The backdoor? ...Uhh... I don't think I've ever been... you know.
Hey, that's a pretty cool gun ya got there! How fast can that thing fire?
That gun looks cool and all, but can it shoot out bullets faster than the average pistol?
Your senpai? Ooh, do tell! I didn't know you already have a crush!
Your senpai? Ain't that another word for 'boyfriend'?
...So you're challenging me to cards? I hope Tara's been teaching you the basics, because I'm gonna win this showdown!
...Are you seriously challenging me, Brock? I've beaten you time and time again in Skull Creek, and this is how you're gonna challenge me? Fine. I'll accept your challenge.
...Is that a challenge? Well, I hope you brought your books, Brocko, 'cause you're gonna get schooled!
Me and Shelly! Sure, we've had our brawls, but those battles only made our bond stronger than before!
Me and Bull! Well, we do have our differences, but as they say, opposites can attract.
Me and Piper! I dunno about her, but I can definitely get used to brawling with her.
I just can't get myself to trust Rico. He has the same attack as me, the same Super. He can do everything I can, but with a bit of bounce!
I don't think I've ever seen a time where Frank and Mortis ever got along.
Definitely Jacky. Honestly, I thought she was a kid with a jackhammer at first, but oh boy, I regret patronizing her.
I'd honestly say Jessie Junker. She looks young but... I just wonder how old she is, really.
Well, I'd do what I'd do with any other enemy. Blast them away.
Oh, Tara... You never really know until you actually see her underneath that mask.
Sandy... I swear he sleeps more than me on a Sunday afternoon! He's gotta be really sick with something for him to be sleeping that much!
...I... mmmfh... I really don't wanna talk about it.
Well, I know Emz has a thing for my buddy Poco, but... It's hard telling how he feels about her.
I honestly don't get why Piper would be dating a literal robot. I don't trust that son of a gun one bit.
It feels like Jacky and Carl like to fight each other a lot, but... I honestly think those two are pent-up in love.
Wait, you can't choose between all of us? Well, that's not an answer I was expecting!
Man, these cards are pretty shiny! Perfect for just checkin' myself out!
Hey! Eyes on your own cards.
Man, I'm lookin' good these days. First Brawler to ever come to Starr Park, and I still look good!
You guys think Shelly would like me with my hair combed to the left or to the right? Man, I can't decide!
...This card has a bit of a white smudge on it... Wait a minute.
Anybody curious about my bullets? My silver ones are nothing to scoff at.
You know, you're playing with a celebrity, right? Heck, my face is practically the icon of my own brand of cereal; Colt Crunch!
I'm glad Stu hasn't showed up to play this game yet. I mean, I appreciate the dude for promoting my cereal brand, but... He's pretty obnoxious.
So fellas, what would you say's the most beautiful thing you've ever seen?
Uh... sun damage? I feel pretty normal right now, honestly.

condition.saying: Sorry, noob. I'm too good, and too pretty for pain!

case.state: Wh- Hey! Those are my lines you little asshole!

condition.saying: I think you got your monsters mixed up.

case.state: My silver bullet works on anyone. It doesn't matter the monster. Don't make me prove a point.

condition.saying: Hope you brought your Slick Boots

case.state: Hah! Colt never runs away from a brawl! You're gonna be the one crawling back to your mansion from whence you came!

condition.saying: You gotta open up your preferences, boo!

case.state: Just because I shoot straight doesn't mean I can't turn, you dunce.

condition.saying: Looks like this girl is out of your reach.

case.state: ...You can insult me all you want, but this gets personal if you're insulting Shelly.

condition.saying: Boy, you desperately need my help...

case.state: Why you little-- My selfies are perfect just the way they are, thank you very much!

condition.saying: Still waiting to check out those headshots, boo.

case.state: You're looking at them. Do you wanna be the first?
Hey, I gotta have a unique look, man! Anyone would think of growing a beard, but not everyone would think of just growing out the sideburns!
Maybe, but beards have never been my style. I'm already a total ladykiller, and if I'm gonna do it, then I've just gotta be me, you know?
Hey, don't worry now, Bobobo! If I wanted you all dead, I'd have done it already! I may be a deadly slinger, but I'm no mindless killer.

condition.saying: but maybe men just like the noise.

case.state: Well, I guess you could say that I like my colts for the noise, though there's really no other weapon that I'd trade out for them.

condition.saying: I guess I figured Earth was rich enough to use laser weapons.

case.state: Well, I'm not so sure about Earth, but back where I'm from, we definitely have those kinds of weapons, but I just tend to stick with my own colts.
Oh, I'm not just dressed up for the occasion. See, back where I'm from, I'm actually one of the sharpest gunslingers out there.
Oh, this isn't just an outfit. Yeah, I do like my dress-up as much as the next guy, but this shows that I'm a sheriff that takes my job pretty seriously.
Oh my colts? Yeah, they're definitely one of a kind. Able to shoot six bullets in one fell swoop.
Hey, you're not too shabby yourself. What kind of guns do you run?
W-What?! No way! I'm the least vain and prideful person I know! Possibly the least anyone I've met has known!
Ah, it's, uh. Colt. You know, the fastest, meanest gunslinger in Starr Park?
Heh, thanks! I always make sure it's--- wait, what was that about the back?
Why, thank you! If you don't care about your hair, you--- wait, did you say the back? What's wrong with it?
Hah! "Plunger guns"? Babe, these bad boys have taken down dozens of brawlers, and that list is still going!
Alright, um... You know, you don't even need that sword right there, 'cause you've already cut right to my heart!
I've lost twice in a row? That can't be right, can we do a recount?
What do you mean I lost twice? That cannot be!
Three times in a row!? No way that's right!
I honestly can't believe I lost three times in a game of strip poker.
(...Don't rage quit, Colt... It's just some bad luck.)
...Man, what is this bad luck?
...Ughh...What are even the odds of this happening?
Alright, who the hell is cheating?
No fair! I seriously can't be losing this much!
I'm first, huh? Well, I suppose I could start things off with a bang!
Well, so much for a perfect streak, I guess.
It's about time I lost, honestly.
Aww man, Guess I'm not Mr. Perfect this round, huh?
Took you guys long enough to get me to strip!
What can I say? I'm a natural born poker player!
Man, and I've only lost the boots so far? Woo!
Whew, I feel like 8-Bit compared to you guys. You guys strip so fast, I barely knew you got clothes on!
I suppose I could spare you the socks, since I'm in the lead.
Guess it's finally my time to shine, huh?
Heh, watch and learn, fellas!
Heh, I'm just too good for this game!
C'mon guys! Keep up, or you'll get left in the dust!
Well now, I suppose it's time to let my colts come into play!
I may be winning now, but that doesn't mean I'm not gonna show off my guns!
Uh oh, looks like I'm finally getting me down to your guys' level!
I suppose it was about time I lose the guns...
Well, it was definitely fun dual wielding while it lasted.
Man, I really was gunning for a while, wasn't I?
About time you shot these guns out of my own two hands!
I'm surprised I'm not failing as badly as I thought I was.
Without my guns, I'm usually pretty defenseless, but...I'm still going strong!
Even without my guns, I can still pull through!
...How am I doing this good without my colts!?
Man, I've never felt a rush this good since I had that energy drink!
This game is getting really intense! I've never felt so alive!
I can definitely feel some adrenaline pumping...
Only a couple layers left, and I'm still in the lead. I got this!
Guess I don't have time to explain, I better get stripping!
Well I guess you can say I'm good at three things now! Shooting, Showing Off, and Stripping!
I may be down to my last layer, but this game's far from over!
I ain't gonna back down like a coward. I'm really gonna strip.
I suppose I better go ahead and get stripping, huh?
Guess it's my turn to start! Let's do this.
Well, here goes nothing.
Time for the real show to begin!
Boots just aren't enough for you guys, huh? Alright alright. I'll strip again.
Oh hey! It's me again!
Looks like it's back to me!
Dang, Thought I had that one.
You guys ready for something bigger?
I'm getting bored stripping the small stuff. Time to go bigger!
My feet are bare, yet you still stare... Alright then.
Me again, huh? Well, prepare to be dazed by my presence!
Time to bring out the big guns! No pun intended.
Ah shoot, guess it's time to shoot!
Well now, looks like you got me cornered now!
Alright alright, I'm dropping the guns, just stop griping!
I don't think I can hold these guns for the entire game, honestly.
Man, I wish I can hold onto my colts the whole game. Ah well.
Yeah yeah, the guns are being dropped, hold your horses now.
Uh oh... Guess I'm next.
...This is starting to not look good for me.
I really don't have much clothing to work with here.
Errrgh...I'm running out of options...
Man, I'm really underestimating you guys, you've shot down another layer!
I guess I'm taking you guys for granted, you've got me stripping down to my underoos.
Hate to admit it, but you guys are getting pretty good at this. Now here's your reward!
I probably shouldn't have replaced that card... Now I'm paying the price for it.
Down to my last layer. Guess I better make this count.
Well, this is it. A one way ticket to nudity.
I could definitely use Poco's help right about now...
Oh boy, how did I even get into this situation?
...Things are not looking good.
...What a rough start...
...Man, what gives? I thought I was doing well!
...Really? Not again...
Alright, this is starting to get a little annoying!
Hey! This isn't funny anymore.
Someone as handsome as me shouldn't be losing this much!
Not another one!
I'm afraid I don't have much choice, don't I?
I'm being struck down hard, but I got an ace up my sleeve.
You guys are really beating me to a pulp! I can't believe it!
What? I barely even held these guns for even a minute!
Already!?
Well, you've most certainly struck me down fast.
...Fastest killjoy in the west right there.
Rrrrgh! Why me!
Alright, who are the wiseguys that are teaming against me?
...Losing this much hurts as much as actually getting shot.
This is so unfair! I shouldn't be losing this much!
...I can't already be this low! This has to be one big understanding! R-right?
...This is humiliating.
This can't be happening to me... This seriously cannot be happening to me!
I guess I'm the noob, aren't I?
What did I ever do to deserve getting naked in front of all of these people?
I can't seriously be on my last layer already! People are gonna see--
Gah! I'm only living on a sliver of my health!
This is probably gonna be my last showdown if I ain't careful...
That lost was a total fluke on my part.
Whoops, I messed up pretty badly, huh?
No big deal, everyone loses sometimes...
One loss, don't get worked up over one misfire!
Handlebar mustache? Hm... I dunno. Never really thought about a regular mustache, let alone a handlebar.
Hm... never thought about having a handlebar mustache before. Or hell, any other kind of mustache either.
Oh yeah? Bet I could still beat him in a duel - just as easily as I'll beat you in this game!
Concieted?! But I'm not... wait, what's "conceited" mean, again?
Uh, well--- Actually, yes! I'm the fastest draw there is around; heck, possibly the fastest there ever was!
Hey Aimee, if you think your gun is flashy...
I don't think I have any other small things to strip other than...
These boots are pretty special, one of a kind I'd say, so don't touch them!
My slick boots have gotten me out of a lot of jams. Makes me run a bit faster than some of the other Brawlers.
I'll just go ahead and slide these boots off nice and easy!
The socks are next, though they aren't as special as my boots.
These socks aren't much, honestly. They don't give me special abilities like my boots do.
Lemme just go ahead and slip these off as well.
Hold onto something, cause the vest's coming off!
Alright! Time to flash you all, Colt style!
This is my favorite part of strip poker! The vest comes off!
Off with the vest...
Man...
Geez...
Ugh...
Yeah yeah, I'm taking my shirt off, no need to get feisty over it.
I am not looking forward to this, but these are the rules.
And off comes the shirt. Surprise o' the century.
I may be running out of layers, but I still got some surprises for you all!
Didn't think I'd be showing my body to a bunch of randos, but here we are.
These pants were getting kinda tight anyhow.
Don't try and faint now, just because you're seeing my cock.
Are you guys ready to see my Magnum Special?
Honestly, it's about time I show off my Silver Bullet.
Step back everyone, because Colt's gonna go big with this strip!
Check it-- I'm gonna blow your minds in a few seconds!
You guys wanna see something flashy?
Teacher? Hey, I don't need a teacher! I'm so good, I can teach myself anything - including being humble!
...Check out my guns! Hahaha!
...Get a load of these babies!
...Then consider this a double flash!
No vest, no problem! It was getting kind of hot in here, anyways!
Somebody stop me, I'm smokin' hot!
Is it hot in here, or is it just my good looks?
No big deal... I've dealt with cooler places before.
To be hot, or to be cool... That's honestly a pretty tough decision.
Maybe I shouldn't have taken that off so soon....
...my secret weapons!
...my akimbo colts!
...my dual wielders!
...With only my shirt covering my chest!
If anyone wants to try them on after the game, you can just ask, but don't just run off with them. They're one of a kind!
Hey, what are you guys waiting for? Let's start the next round!
Just taking these off already makes me feel a lot slower...
Guess it's time to step things up a notch.
I've had to do some brawling in my bare feet before. Shouldn't be any different with just a card game.
Let's hope this floor is not as dirty as I think it is...
Sun's out, guns out, know what I'm saying?
I suppose it's time for you all to check out my guns!
As Primo would say: It's showtime, baby!
Pew pew! Rise and shine, ~player~!
Wait... What have I done!?
Hold on... Why did I do that!?
...Uh oh... Now I'm defenseless without my guns!
If my guns are gone...that would mean... ...Oh no...
Wait... No! Why did I have to drop my weapons!?
I really gotta take this game seriously...
...Why am I not taking this game seriously!?
Wait, I'm losing! I can't be losing my shirt! I gotta step it up!
What? You think I'd wear some boring tighty whites? Nah, real men wear boxers!
Honestly, the tightness of these boxers almost makes it worth it.
Do these boxers make my butt look big?
Well, here you guys are. Not many have seen it, honestly. It's that elusive.
I can't take too much more damage, I'm really only one hit away from getting struck down!
Whew, that feels better! Even I can't stand tight clothes for that long.
Heh, Impressed?
No vest, no problem! It was getting kind of hot in here, anyways!
Somebody stop me, I'm smokin' hot!
Is it hot in here, or is it just my good looks?
No big deal... I've dealt with cooler places before.
To be hot, or to be cool... That's honestly a pretty tough decision.
Maybe I shouldn't have taken that off so soon....
What's coming off, ~name~?
Shoot your shot, ~name~!
Haha! ~name~ lost? Who would've thunk it?
Looks like it's your time to shine, ~name~!
What's it gonna be, ~name~?
Alright! Let's see what'cha got! Give it to me!
How will you impress ol' Colt?
Better make it snappy, ~name~!
Make your strip count, mister!
You better give me something good to work with here...
C'mon, gimme something good!
C'mon ~name~! Give it to me!
Y'know, If you're not gonna take off the gloves now, you gotta aim a bit higher!
Oh come on, Kyoko! It's not like the world's gonna end if you lose!
Alright, I know a scared look when I see one. What's going on here?
Alright, Kyoko. I kept my mouth shut long enough, What's under those gloves?
Hey... are you alright? I've seen anyone this blue since... well, I don't wanna talk about it.
Oh shoot! She's shooting!
